title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Health) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister health) order 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Stephen Foley, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Stephen Foley, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Health, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the 
Minister for Health with effect from 23 January 2025.
text_norm: 2 stephen foley particular whose address deposited office department health appointed special adviser minister health effect 23 january 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 3. Bríd Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Bríd Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Health, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the 
Minister for Health with effect from 28 April 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

6 May, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [182] 3
text_norm: 3 brid murphy particular whose address deposited office department health appointed special adviser minister health effect 28 april 2025 given official seal government 6 may 2025 micheal martin taoiseach notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 9th may 2025 182 3

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this Order is to appoint two Special Advisers to the Minister for 
Health 

 
 
 
 
 4 [182]
